.TourDates p {

}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;

}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {

}

<div class="cmsmasters_column one_first">
<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Touring The Charming Land of Madhya Pradesh</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/india-tour-packages" title="India Tour Packages">India</a> » <a href="/madhya-pradesh-tour-packages" title="Madhya Pradesh Tour Packages">Madhya Pradesh</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Charming Madhya Pradesh Tour</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c314bdd1928_02026137" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/include/charming-madhya-pradesh_mmmda0.jpg" alt="Charming Madhya Pradesh Tour" title="Charming Madhya Pradesh Tour" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>The state of Madhya Pradesh is guarded by Rajasthan, Gujarat, Maharashtra, Uttar Pradesh and Chhattisgarh, making it a land-locked state. However, it has a lot to boast in terms of its natural beauty and historical significance. Madhya Pradesh never falls short of tourist spots with majestic temples, historical monuments, hill resorts, amazing waterfalls and the enticing national parks and wildlife sanctuaries that are filled with flora and fauna of a wide variety. The kingly appearance of the monuments, in terms of architecture, stand as witness to the artistic taste of the royalty, for which this land was once well-famed. Its medieval charm is felt in all the ancient marvels that still survive in various parts of the state. You can also opt to visit the various sacred centres like the Udaipur, Orchha and Bhojpur temples which offer spiritual as well as artistic relief. Plan a tour to Madhya Pradesh for a complete holiday package.</p>
<p><strong>About The Package:</strong></p>
<p>The “Charming Madhya Pradesh’ tour package arranged by Namaste India Trip consists of all the elements required for a holiday including visit to the ancient structures and enjoying scenic views that display the geographic beauty of the land. The exotic landscape and the medieval period structures will all be part of this tour. The most prominent site will be the national park visit where you will come face to face with the wildlife of the region that give you pleasure which cannot be expressed with words. Different scenic beauties like gorges and valley can be enjoyed all through the trip. You will also come across the Marble Rocks and other monuments during the tour which will make the trip more exciting. Namaste India Trip ensures through its professional excellence that its customers get the most fun out of any trip without any bumps along the way. So, book right away to enjoy an adventurous trip to Charming Madhya Pradesh for a full-fun package.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i>  Charming Madhya Pradesh Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Jabalpur Arrival</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>The Namaste India Trip representative will receive you at Jabalpur and check you into the hotel pre-booked for you. You can freshen up and spend the entire day sightseeing. Night stay will take place in the Jabalpur hotel.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Jabalpur to Bhedaghat and Back to Jabalpur</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>On day 2 you will finish breakfast and move on to Bhedaghat from this commercial hub to enjoy boat ride and sightseeing at the ‘Marble Rocks’. The ‘Marble Rocks’ are basically an area falling on the river banks next to Jabalpur. The ‘soft marble’ is actually created by the river, making a gorge that extends up to 3km. After you have had enough of this magnificent piece of nature’s beauty you will come back to Jabalpur for night stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Jabalpur to Bandhavgarh (169km / estimated 5 hours)</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Post breakfast on day 3 you can take in the last of Jabalpur sightseeing. Jabalpur was once the ‘Gond’ Kings’ capital in the 12th century which today stands as a ‘pleasure resort’. It is a significant center for administration that bustles with various types of commercial activities. Next move on to Bandhavgarh which is approximately a 5-hour drive from Jabalpur. Check into a hotel at Bandhavgarh and rest for the night in the hotel.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>At Bandhavgarh</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>On day 4 after you are done with the breakfast, you will be taken to the green and forested lands of Bandhavgarh which stands out to be a haven for the wild species of this region. If you can manage to get glimpse of any of these magnificent creatures you will take pride in treasuring it for the rest of your life. You can also opt for jeep safari or elephant ride to get closer to the wildlife variety available here which includes the ‘royal tigers’ ruling in this region. Once you are satisfied with your ride return to the hotel before dark to rest for the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Bandhavgarh to Kanha (246km/ estimated 6 hours)</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Post breakfast on day 5 you will take a 6-hour drive to reach Kanha National Park, having checked out of the hotel in Bandhavgarh. When you reach Kanha you will check into the hotel or resort (as pre-booked) to take rest at night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>At Kanha</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>The Kanha National Park is one the best administered and finest Asian National Parks that attracts tourists from the ends of the world, especially those that are wildlife and nature lovers. Be it the avian or animal population, you will not have enough time to see them all while touring this park. After a wonderful encounter with the wildlife of this region you can return to the hotel in Kanha to spend the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 7 :</span>Leaving for Jabalpur (169km/ estimated 5 hours)</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>On day 7 after breakfast, the Namaste India Trip representative will assist you safely back to the Jabalpur station to get back home with lots of happy memories of the charming Madhya Pradesh.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Charming Madhya Pradesh Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is Madhya Pradesh's Unique Selling Point?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> There are numerous national parks and wildlife sanctuaries for wildlife enthusiasts, including Ralamandal, Kanha National Park, Bandhavgarh National Park, Pench National Park, and others. There are many famous temples in Madhya Pradesh for those seeking religious solace, such as Bhojpur Mandir, Chaturbhuj Mandir, and Saas Bahu Temple.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Why Is Madhya Pradesh Known As The "Heart Of Incredible India"?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Madhya Pradesh is not known as the "Heart of India" solely because of its location in the country's center. It has a rich cultural heritage that includes Hinduism, Buddhism, Jainism, and Islam. Throughout the state, there are numerous monuments, exquisitely carved temples, stupas, forts, and palaces.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> When Is The Best Time To Visit Madhya Pradesh?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> October to February is the best time to visit Madhya Pradesh because of the milder weather. Enjoy outdoor activities, visit national parks, and more. It is also a good time to observe Pachmarhi Utsav, Tansen Music Festival, and other well-known celebrations.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Cuisine Is Madhya Pradesh Famous For?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Madhya Pradesh has a variety of cuisines to offer, including the distinct Malwa cuisine, the Nimar cuisine, and the Bagelkhand cuisine. Rass Kheer, Lapsi, Kalakand, Lavang Latika, Palak Puri, and Bhutte Ki Kees are all popular desserts (grated corn roasted in ghee and later cooked in milk with spices).</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is The State Sweet Of Madhya Pradesh?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Mawa Bati, is the special state sweet of Madhya Pradesh.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>

		<p><span id="wpcf7-673c314bde74a-wrapper" class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap website_fill-wrap" style="display:none !important; visibility:hidden !important;"><label for="wpcf7-673c314bde74a-field" class="hp-message">Please leave this field empty.</label><input id="wpcf7-673c314bde74a-field"  class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text" type="text" name="website_fill" value="" size="40" tabindex="-1" autocomplete="new-password" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-name"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-required" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Full Name*" value="" type="text" name="your-name" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-email"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-email wpcf7-validates-as-required wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-email" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Email Id*" value="" type="email" name="your-email" /></span>
		</p>
		<p class="sCntry"><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap your-country"><input class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-intl_tel wpcf7-intl-tel" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="in" data-initialcountry="in" data-preferredcountries="gb-in" value="" type="tel" name="your-country-cf7it-national" /><input name="your-country" type="hidden" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-full" /><input type="hidden" name="your-country-cf7it-country-name" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-country-name" /><input type="hidden" name="your-country-cf7it-country-code" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-country-code" /><input type="hidden" name="your-country-cf7it-country-iso2" class="wpcf7-intl-tel-country-iso2" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-phones"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-tel wpcf7-validates-as-required wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-tel" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="10 digit mobile number" value="" type="tel" name="your-phones" /></span>
		</p>
		<p><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-date"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-required" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Time of Travel*" value="" type="text" name="your-date" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-trMess"><textarea cols="40" rows="10" maxlength="140" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-textarea" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Write a description of your tour so we can design the best package for you!" name="your-trMess"></textarea></span>
		</p>
		<div>
			<p><button type="submit" class="waves-bxt submitBtn2">SEND ME DETAILS <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right"></i></button><br />
<span class="infoBxs">We never share your Information.</span>
			</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div><div class="wpcf7-response-output" aria-hidden="true"></div>
</form>
</div>
</div>

excerpt.rendered: Touring The Charming Land of Madhya Pradesh Home » India » Madhya Pradesh » Charming Madhya Pradesh Tour Tour Overview The state of Madhya Pradesh is guarded by Rajasthan, Gujarat, Maharashtra, Uttar Pradesh and Chhattisgarh, making it a land-locked state. However, it has a lot to boast in terms of its natural beauty and historical...
